title: Man and His Mate (1940) Adventure Movie | No wonder the girls sigh for a Caveman!

sources.title: Man and His Mate (1940) Adventure Movie | No wonder the girls sigh for a Caveman!
sources.description:
Tumak, a young cave man who strives to unite the uncivilized Rock Tribe and the peaceful Shell Tribe, Carole Landis as Loana, daughter of the Shell Tribe chief and Tumak’s love interest, and Lon Chaney, Jr. as Tumak’s stern father and leader of the Rock Tribe.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/8I5efhBTiMc


Directors: Hal Roach & Hal Roach Jr.
Writers: Mickell Novack, George Baker, Joseph Frickert
Stars: Victor Mature, Carole Landis, Lon Chaney Jr., Conrad Nagel
Genres: Colorized, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Romance, Sci-Fi


Original title: One Million B.C. (1940) UK: Man and His Mate / The Cave Dwellers  | USA: One Million B.C. / Man and His Mate / Battle of the Giants  / Cave Man / Tumak
